title: Biden Says Russian Use of a Nuclear Weapon Would Be a ‘Serious Mistake’
description: President Biden’s remarks reflect the urgent concern in Washington and among Western allies that Russia may be searching for a pretext to unleash a battlefield nuclear weapon.
dc:creator: David E. Sanger

media:description: Ukrainian officials have accused Russia of secretly building dirty bombs at the Zaporizhzhia nuclear power plant.
